name: Swampgas Shade
condition_immunities: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Soul Drain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 12 (2d8+3) psychic and target's Cha score is reduced by 1d4. Target dies if this reduces its Cha to 0. Otherwise reduction lasts until target finishes a short or long rest. If a Humanoid dies from this it can't be restored to life until shade is put to rest (see Rejuvenation).

actions.name: Haunting Murmurs
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +3 to hit, 60 ft., one creature,. 8 (1d8+3) psychic.

bonus_actions.name: Swampland Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: Takes the Hide action. It must be in swampy terrain to use this bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: Move through space 1ft.+ wide with o squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Rejuvenation
special_abilities.desc: If it dies within its bound region shade returns to life in 1d4 days and regains all hp. This doesn't function if shade is put to rest which occurs after its corpse has been reburied outside swamp.

special_abilities.name: Swampbound
special_abilities.desc: Is bound to a region of swamp within 1 mile of its body. If shade leaves region loses its Soul Drain action until it returns to the region. If it remains outside region automatically teleports back to its corpse after 24 hrs regardless of distance.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: Dex (Stealth) to hide in swamp.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.
